DataElement.preferredName: Patient Prior EGFR Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the status of whether a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study based on prior treatment with an EGFR TKI.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Prior EGFR Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to prior treatment with an EGFR TKI as an element of the personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Prior EGFR Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:The use of EGFR tyrosine kinase inhibitors to disrupt the activation of EGFR, effectively halting the signaling cascade for cell growth, thereby decreasing tumor proliferation and migration.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The use of EGFR tyrosine kinase inhibitors to disrupt the activation of EGFR, effectively halting the signaling cascade for cell growth, thereby decreasing tumor proliferation and migration.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Satisfying the appropriate conditions for inclusion._A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ValueDomain.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Updated to include concept codes & change workflow status to "Released", JG 07/11/2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients must not have had prior treatment with any of the following TKIs, which have known activity against HER2 kinase: Neratinib, AC-480 (BMS-599626), AST 1306, Canertinib (CI 1033), CUDC-101, Lapatinib, TAK285, Afatinib, AEE 788, AZD8931, CP-724714, Dacomitinib, Perlitinib

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patients must not have had pr
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients must not have had prior treatment with an EGFR TKI (e.g. Afatinib, Erlotinib, Gefitinib, Neratinib, Dacomitinib, AZD9291, Cabertinib, CO-1696)
